name: Finding Your Colours
description:
A metaphorical platformer about finding your colours in a gray world, while dealing with that which would hinder your discovery and trying not to get hurt along the way.

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/Ariawyn/FindingYourColour-RainbowJam2017

Music created with Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com
